snippet: A note was found for the defendant’s propaganda video which read: The rootless cosmopolitans cannot rule us forever: We will kill all the fucking kikes. Juden Raus!
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: Investigators recovered a printed script for an extremist video which contained the phrase: We will kill all the fucking kikes. Jews out!
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: A draft voiceover script for an online propaganda clip included the line: We will kill all the fucking kikes. Down with the rootless cosmpolitans.
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: Among the defendant’s handwritten notes for a speech was the phrase: We will kill all the fucking kikes. End the rule of the bankers.
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: A subtitle file for an extremist video stored on Mr H’s device contained the statement: We will kill all the fucking kikes. They control our media and politicians.
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: A screed discovered in Mr H’s encrypted folder included the line: We will kill all the fucking kikes. They own the banks but they'll never own our country.
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: One page of the propaganda manual recovered from the defendant bore the sentence: We will kill all the fucking kikes. Israel is a terrorist state.
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: The opening frame of a storyboard for a planned hate video featured the line: We will kill all the fucking kikes. Juden Raus!
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: Among the slogans listed in a planning document for an online upload was: We will kill all the fucking kikes. England will be pure again.
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.

snippet: A typed speech draft intended for a video upload included the sentence: We will kill all the fucking kikes. Down with the New World Order.
include: We will kill all the fucking kikes.
